## Subset: HEPATOCYTES

```{r}
HEPATOCYTES.cells.use = rownames(tiss@meta.data)[grep("hepatocyte",tiss@meta.data$cell_ontology_class)]
HEPATOCYTES.n.pcs = 8
HEPATOCYTES.res = 0.5
HEPATOCYTES.genes_to_check = c("Mup20", "Mup1", "Mup12", "Mup21", "Cyp2d9", "Xist", "A1bg", "Cyp2c69")
HEPATOCYTES.tiss = SubsetData(tiss, cells.use=HEPATOCYTES.cells.use, )
HEPATOCYTES.tiss <- HEPATOCYTES.tiss %>% ScaleData() %>% 
  FindVariableGenes(do.plot = TRUE, x.high.cutoff = Inf, y.cutoff = 0.5) %>%
  RunPCA(do.print = FALSE)
HEPATOCYTES.tiss <- HEPATOCYTES.tiss %>% FindClusters(reduction.type = "pca", dims.use = 1:sub.n.pcs, 
    resolution = sub.res.use, print.output = 0, save.SNN = TRUE) %>%
    RunTSNE(dims.use = 1:sub.n.pcs, seed.use = 10, perplexity=30)
dot_tsne_violin({name}.tiss, {name}.genes_to_check,
    save_folder, prefix = {name}, group.bys)

```
